text:
Hi everyone,
I have a few questions regarding the API capabilities available in our HubSpot account, specifically with Sales Hub Professional and CMS Hub Professional:
*API Access & Capabilities:*

    ◦ With our HubSpot version (Sales Hub Professional and CMS Hub Professional), do we have the ability to create custom API calls and trigger actions via the API?
    ◦ If yes, could you please confirm the specific API capabilities we have based on our subscription?
*Deleting Emails via API:*

    ◦ Is it possible to create an API call that allows us to delete emails in the HubSpot inbox based on specific criteria? For example, if we search for the string "809548," can we use an API call to delete all emails containing that string in the HubSpot inbox?
Thank you for your assistance!
you can use a require_head tag instead
```some use-cases for require_head include supplying meta tags, and special link tags (like prefetch and preconnect) from modules.```
is `visibility.access` and `visibility.access.scopes` documented anywhere? _(for module fields)_

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

<#C22PU4LV8|general>
Can anyone answer this question:
In HubSpot account, when we attached pdf attachment to HubSpot ticket then webhook is triggered or not?
Thank you Matt! Not sure how I missed that
